message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $150?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $165. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
